html:
6.14.22  4:07 pm   What do you think of thinking 

      it's another world, in your mind!

6.14.22  3:28 pm   what's a good adjective you could use

      bad

6.14.22  1:11 pm   Will your next video be part video part song, like I'm a huge gamer most of the time?

      yes

6.14.22  12:30 pm   Does it annoy you when people on here ask you questions you've already answered a bunch of times?

      that never happens. each question is a brand new entirely unique question

6.14.22  11:35 am   why is the oboe the worst instrument?

      because it sounds bad. that's just hypothetically speaking, because i actually don't remember what it sounds like. perhaps i blocked it out of my memory

6.14.22  10:29 am   Is it weird

      yes

6.14.22  3:19 am   hey bill, how do you "get good at using chords" for lack of a better way to put it?

      it's the same way to get good at talking, which is actually just to do it a lot. alone or with friends, at home or in the workplace,

6.14.22  2:43 am   is impossible a limitation?

      one would think

6.14.22  2:32 am   whats the meaning of life

      it's you

6.14.22  1:58 am   best part of a pogo stick?

      the highs

6.14.22  12:39 am   did you have a manic monday

      i had a manic monday 3 mondays ago, and there's another one coming up

6.14.22  12:02 am   What's your favorite pizza topping 

      a different pizza

6.13.22  11:21 pm   can u post more content on ur yt

      i'm currently making it too slow and too fast at the same time. best of both worlds

6.13.22  9:48 pm   Ever listen back to your old songs?

      occasionally

6.13.22  9:17 pm   how long is the next song

      2:02

6.13.22  8:01 pm   let's say, hypothetically, for the sake of argument, that you COULDN'T do everything, then how would you decide what to do?

      start making a list of things you could do. then when you get tired of listing things, use a randomized selection method to choose something from the list

6.13.22  7:21 pm   How do you create such nice melodies?

      a standard trick sometimes is to pretend to be making a bad melody. sort of like a fake-out. melodies actually love that. fake-outs are melodic by nature

6.13.22  7:20 pm   Have you ever felt like you were trapped in a time loop?

      no

6.13.22  6:50 pm   Why are the French?

      due to france, ultimately

6.13.22  4:45 pm   it's nearly the last day of school but i'm gonna be lonely all summer what do i do

      how about going on the internet

6.13.22  4:30 pm   Hey Bill! What are your influences when it comes to film making? Hugs from norway! 

      have you ever crossed a city street on an early sunday morning

6.13.22  1:58 pm   Is this where the fun begins?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.13.22  1:47 pm   how can i make a song out of a riff

      start out with the riff. then put something else next. if you're stumped, try to make it the wrong thing. the results may surprise you

6.13.22  1:41 pm   What is your favorite Star Wars character (Jedi)?

      George Lucas

6.13.22  1:22 pm   you say you don't listen to albums in order, so what if you made an album that if you listen to it in order it's supposed to be incomprehensible and its basically like 10 songs come out at once

      i think multiple new songs released at the same time makes all the songs weaker. it's like eating 12 dinners in one night. none of them are good, not even the first one, because you're already stressed about the 11 dinners you're responsible for eating tonight also

6.13.22  12:51 pm   what's your favorite chord progression that you've used in a song of yours

      maybe the outvamp to the money song

6.13.22  11:55 am   what do you think about isosceles?

      good for arrows, and pointing

6.13.22  11:24 am   What's wrong with me

      you might be just right

6.13.22  11:07 am   should i figure out music language

      sure

6.13.22  9:21 am   is there something that is possible to do

      yes

6.13.22  7:48 am   Why is English such a weird language

      you can blame mother nature for that

6.13.22  6:59 am   How to make sense 

      impossible. it can't be done

6.13.22  5:43 am   what should be the best sorting method but isn't

      everything first

6.13.22  4:28 am   I skipped out on a family vacation to take a last minute week long gig that I was under the impression would be more serious than it actually is. It's inconvenient cuz I have to rehearse for 50min with a group made up of small children twice a day every day for the whole week (I thought I'd be playing higher level music), and the two daily rehearsal sessions are like 4 hours apart. But I am getting paid a nice chunk of money so was it worth it or not?

      it is. you'll learn something about something. you'll be 1 step closer to knowing what gigs you like, and you'll definitely learn something about yourself somehow. especially during the breaks

6.12.22  9:35 pm   Any ideas about why humans are the only species that seems to have evolved to make/enjoy music?

      it happens fast. it's like when it starts to rain, that moment the first drop hits. why is there only 1 drop so far?

6.12.22  9:08 pm   I've noticed that my favorite part of a lot of your songs, especially in the past few months, has been the last bit at the end Specifically in "I'm a huge gamer most of the time" and "at the corner store". Do you find the end of a song to be any easier or harder to write than the beginning?

     it's unpredictable. some of it's always easy and some of it's always hard, but it's impossible to predict which parts it will be

     Also, what's your stance on ending a song with a definite phrase versus letting it fade out?

      it's important to be like a responsible doctor and evaluate each song with a clear and open mind, to find what works best for that particular song

6.12.22  8:12 pm   Hi, I'm a time traveler from 2020.  Have you decided what song you're making after "might quit"? 

      the song i made and produced immediately after might quit was "i'm a princess". but it probably won't be the next one released because the video was already halfway produced on the old system, and i'll definitely want to use those parts, so, it will require a sort of frankenstein treatment that i'd rather not get into on the first run on the new system. would rather start clean on a new music video, and likely do princess soon after. but first i need to get out of this deep rabit hole within a rabbit hole of character rigging experiments and more

6.12.22  7:21 pm   Thoughts on farming?

      dank

6.12.22  6:15 pm   how to get people to love trains

      make more better trains

6.12.22  3:39 pm   could a question answer itself

      sure

6.12.22  2:58 pm   do you ever turn up, or do you prefer turning down

      turn over

6.12.22  2:42 pm   how to?

      impossible. it can't be done

      a 19th century grandfather clock

6.12.22  2:40 pm   do you answer every question

      not even close

6.12.22  2:08 pm   opinion on aging

      i think it's bullshit

6.12.22  1:56 pm   How are you doing?

      pretty good

6.12.22  12:30 pm   am i asking a question right now?

      let me perform some calculations

6.12.22  12:19 pm   Is your art style influenced by any abstract artist? Because I have noticed that if you pause any one of your recent videos at any one moment that you get an abstract painting but in 3d

      the ones that use 3D are usually not particularly cool on 1 frame because they get most of their value from the 3D space, which can only be seen properly when the camera is moving slightly

6.12.22  9:53 am   how does one buy a meteor

      always rent meteors

6.12.22  8:57 am   am i a poetry? are you?

      yes, and so much more
